phrs.translation: 节制者, 戒断者, 戒酒者, 弃权者

sentences.sentence: Mental intervention has good effect to cultivate self-esteem of abstainer.
sentences.translation: 心理干预对培养戒酒者的自尊心有很好的效果。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to investigate the effect of mental intervention to elevate self-esteem of abstainer.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨心理干预对提高戒酒者自尊心的效果。

sentences.sentence: I was reading the answer up to the point where the author listed Canada as an abstainer then I stopped reading.
sentences.translation: 当我看到加拿大选择弃权时我停止阅读这个答案了。
